original_title: 任侠ヤンキー DOUBLE MAX
overview: A Yankee drama starring popular sexy actress Kana Yume. Mayumi, the second generation of the Uratora family, and Nozomi, a female student who looks exactly alike. The two lived in turns and enjoyed another world, but one day they learned that Mayumi's henchman, Ryuji, was making fun of him at the gambling hall ...
title: Ninja Yankee Double Max
